    "body": "## Code Review\n\nThis pull request addresses feedback from a previous code review, primarily by optimizing a backend test and improving frontend error handling. The changes look good overall, with solid new tests for the backend `update_feed_url` endpoint and significant UI/UX improvements on the frontend, such as using a modal for editing and providing inline error messages. I've found an issue related to the new error handling logic in the frontend. The `fetchData` helper function currently catches errors and displays a generic `alert`, which prevents the new, more specific inline error UI in the edit modal from working. My review includes a suggestion to refactor this to ensure errors are handled consistently and provide a better user experience.",
